00060 void ChannelCalib::PrintAsPhp(FILE *f) const
00061 {
00062    fprintf(f, "array(");
00063    fprintf(f, "'Americium' => array(");
00064    fprintf(f, "'ACoef' => %7.4f, ",         fAmAmp.fCoef);

00066    fprintf(f, "'ICoef' => %7.4f, ",         fAmInt.fCoef);
00067    fprintf(f, "'ICoefErr' => %7.4f, ",      fAmInt.fCoefErr);
00068    fprintf(f, "),");
00069    fprintf(f, "'Gadolinium' => array(");
00070    fprintf(f, "'ACoef' => %7.4f, ",         fGdAmp.fCoef);
00071    fprintf(f, "'ACoefErr' => %7.4f, ",      fGdAmp.fCoefErr);
00072    fprintf(f, "'ICoef' => %7.4f, ",         fGdInt.fCoef);
00073    fprintf(f, "'ICoefErr' => %7.4f, ",      fGdInt.fCoefErr);
00074    fprintf(f, "),");

00076    fprintf(f, "'EffectiveGain' => %7.4f, ", fEffectiveGain);
00077    fprintf(f, "'DLWidth' => %7.4f, ",       fDLWidth);
00078    fprintf(f, "'DLWidthErr' => %7.4f, ",    fDLWidthErr);
00079    fprintf(f, "'T0Coef' => %7.4f, ",        fT0Coef);
00080    fprintf(f, "'T0CoefErr' => %7.4f, ",     fT0CoefErr);
00081    fprintf(f, "'fAvrgEMiss' => %7.4f, ",    fAvrgEMiss);
